name: The Quick Crit
description:
The Quick Crit is a roguelike-esque ranching/farming game. You are a witch stuck in a weird place where an old man has captured you as a slave. You have to buy your freedom out of that place by maintaining the old man's ranch. 
The ranch can be populated with various critters whose produce can be collected for selling to the local marketplace. Every critter gives different resources and sell for a different price. You can buy critters from a shop and there are 6 types of critters. The aspect that separates "The Quick Crit" from other farming and ranching games is the timer. You have 15 minutes to earn 100k rops (the in-game currency) and failure will lead to eternal slavery.  Controls:  The game can be played entirely by a mouse. The player moves to the point where they right click. The UI can be worked with the mouse and in some places middle button or q can be used. Credits: All gameplay and Programming done by CybearTron. All the Game Design also done by CybearTron All the Art is done by CybearTron. The color palette used is https://lospec.com/palette-list/nanner-2022 from Lospec.com The Easter Egg images are from the internet and Edge's image creator (Yes there is an easter egg hidden in the game and you can find it by exploring the map!) The SFX are made by Cybeartron. The absolute lit music for the game is made by Greg Edwards. He is the greatest musician that I have ever worked with. Great stuff. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDC-hj2x9a5W4R8x9KKP0PA All the voice acting is done by Cybeartron by playing around with audacity and pitches haha! Programs used: Godot 3.5 Piskel Krita Audacity Google (for programming help) Ai image creator (for easter egg) I hope you enjoy. I have spent the most effort on this game and this is a very important project for me.
